title: 200. Trent Dalton: All Our Shimmering Skies
itunes:author: Words and Nerds: Authors, books and literature.
itunes:summary: Trent Dalton celebrates his new book All Our Shimmering Skies with Dani Vee on the Words and Nerds Podcast's 200th Episode. Join the conversation and come along as we traverse the world on an odyssey from 1942 Darwin to Shakespeare to Wilde to moments in life to the sky and back again.

description: Trent Dalton celebrates his new book All Our Shimmering Skies with Dani Vee on the Words and Nerds Podcast's 200th Episode. Join the conversation and come along as we traverse the world on an odyssey from 1942 Darwin to Shakespeare to Wilde to moments in life to the sky and back again.
